name: bpmlabs-services
author: Johannes Wettinger <mail@jojow.de>
description: Some basic services to be used for implementing business processes in the BPM labs

scripts.start-forever: forever start -a -l forever.log -o out.log -e err.log bin/server
scripts.static-forever: forever start -a -l forever.static.log -o out.static.log -e err.static.log node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server $STATIC_DIR -p $STATIC_PORT --cors
